            :time (y / year
                  :mod (b / big)

                        :ARG0 ii2

                                    :mod (t2 / this))

                                    :op2 (a3 / amount

      :snt2 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (w / wait-01
                  :ARG1 ii2
                  :ARG2 (s6 / start-01
                        :ARG0 ii2)))
      :snt3 l
      :ARG0 (y2 / year
            :mod (b2 / build-01)
            :mod b)
      :poss (ii3 / i)
